name: Abundant Ebon Deer (Complete)
description:
A complete projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is an auspicious spiritual beast wrought into being to the Ambrosial Arbor and protects its roots. Its arrival brings along exuberant vegetation and promises good fortune.
Once destroyed during ancient wars, the Ambrosial Arbor is mended by the Stellaron and finally revives. Rare creatures and legendary beasts made by celestials of the past all return to this world, like an old dream coming alive again.

skills.name: Pedicel: Wintry Wind
skills.description: Summons Ambrosial Arbor branch "Twig of Wintry Wind"

skills.name: Pedicel: Marple Leaf
skills.description: Summons Ambrosial Arbor branch "Twig of Marple Leaf"

skills.name: Pedicel: Glorious Blooms
skills.description: Summons Ambrosial Arbor branch "Twig of Glorious Blooms"

skills.name: Pedicel: Lavish Fruits
skills.description: Summons Ambrosial Arbor branch "Twig of Lavish Fruits."

skills.name: Wavering Bleat
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Caress of Wind
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Hardy Leaf Sheath
skills.description: Increases DEF. Toughness cannot be reduced.

skills.name: Flamboyant Gore
skills.description: Uses this ability immediately when there are 2 Lavish Fruits on the field. Deals massive Lightning DMG to all targets. Deals more damage for every Ambrosial Arbor Branch on the field. After the ability is used, removes all Twigs of Lavish Fruits on the field.

skills.name: Everlife
skills.description: Immediately restores HP and gains 1 stack of Synwood Renewal.

skills.name: Pedicel: Ivy Allure
skills.description: Summons 2 Ambrosial Arbor Branch "Twig of Wintry Wind."

skills.name: Pedicel: Willow Sprig
skills.description: Summons 2 Ambrosial Arbor Branch "Twig of Marple Leaf."

skills.name: Pedicel: Hazel Lush
skills.description: Summons 2 Ambrosial Arbor Branch "Twig of Marple Leaf," 1 Ambrosial Arbor Branch "Twig of Wintry Wind," and 1 Ambrosial Arbor Branch "Twig of Glorious Blooms."

skills.name: Pedicel: Entwined Vines
skills.description: Summons 2 Ambrosial Arbor Branch "Twig of Lavish Fruits," 1 Ambrosial Arbor Branch "Twig of Marple Leaf," and 1 Ambrosial Arbor Branch "Twig of Wintry Wind."

skills.name: Vigor Overflow
skills.description: Every time the Abundant Ebon Deer gains a buff from enemy targets, DMG dealt by the Abundant Ebon Deer and all Ambrosial Arbor branches is slightly increased.
